name: Cecilia McDaniel
text: So let's be honest and brash here. Yes I am a former employee, who left the company because the current manager is a tyrant!! Today one of my associates called Hanes and asked if they could make change, the store manager got a nasty attitude, so my associate hung up. The store manager from Hanes stormed over to my store raised all kinds of hell and then had the NERVE TO ASK IF I HAVE COVID!!!... Y'all need to get her under control!! She is the sole reason I left the company!! Who or what gives her the right or the authority to ask that about other peoples private medical statuses, if there even is one?

GO by The New You Bra Boutique and see what she has for you.... THE BEST AROUND !

text: I love Torrid. As a plus size woman I feel like I cant go into most places and find sexy trendy  etc clothes but Torrid always delivers. If anything I wish they carried a few more of the bigger sizes in the stores but I know I can usually find it online if not in store!

name: Megan Cook
text: Went in at 6:20. Had a handful of items picked out by 6:30. Just needed to try on and pay. Employee told me their changing rooms were closed because they were preparing to close, despite having just let another lady into a room. Their store does not close until 7:00. I was in town for work and needed a couple things for the week. I do not buy clothes without trying them on. Left without purchasing them. Will not be back to this location.

name: Cornesia Lewis
text: I want to start by saying the only reason I give it 4 stars is because the staff wasn’t welcoming at the time, love the clothes but it made me want to shop else where because of how the staff was. When I went to try on stuff, which I was iffy about (covid-19), but I have to try on certain stuff. At first i was the only one in the store for a little while before a second person came in, I asked about the dressing room, girl went in to clean it sanitize which I appreciate. But if I’m about to buy something & I’m trying it on why is the staff asking how long I got in the dressing room she knocked on door more than once , like was there a time limit or something? she kept asking me other people need to try on stuff I’m thinking like it’s about 4 other rooms & then they told me once I go in I can’t go in but once.  With that being said I made sure that I took in all what I could & wanted to purchase. Like don’t rush I’m trying multiple pieces, come out it’s like one person with two other people sitting including a man, which he is not trying on stuff waiting. Manager kept making small comments to staff hardly spoke when I came in....I wanted to give them a piece of my mind but wasn’t worth my time,  hence store was only open about 45 mins when I arrived so I don’t want to hear anything about a long day. Would have never went into store but shop online but I needed something I didn’t want to wait To ship only to arrive with limited selection. The world is already in a crisis to have people like this   Someone would love to have your job & customers are what keeping it open.

Therefore, I have an expectation when I don my clothing for an outing or a simple evening at home with family and friends. I want to look and feel good.  #Catherines

text: Staff member forced me and my lady to wear masks, believe her name was MJ , while not wearing hers or making other customers wear a mask. I was told I wasn't going to be allowed to enter without mask yet the employee herself wasn't wearing hers nor were other customers forced as we were. Hypocrisy at its finest.

resp.text: Meemaw, we sincerely apologies for this incident. Our policy is to follow current government mandates and require that everyone in the store wears masks. If staff was not complying and enforcing this policy selectively we will be sure to look into it and make the necessary changes. I can assure you this will not happen again. Once again I'm sorry for your experience and thank you for the feedback, we hope you will give us another chance.

text: Prices are cheap in comparison to the surrounding areas. The staff is always there to help. Very clean always. name: Melissa Carter
text: OMG. I went to this store with one goal, a new toy that was blue tooth and would work with my music. Only problem, the clerk was not knowledgeable about the product or was just trying to make a sell. I purchased the Jive by We-Vibe. Not a bad product but the wrong product. So if they tell you this particular product works with your music, LIES. I paid $160 for it and you can get it on the We-Vibe site for $120, bc it doesn’t work with music. And of course you can’t return it. I think I deserve to have what I asked the clerk for.

text:
My husband just took me to this store last night. They have a great variety of items and the store is very clean and well kept. The people there are nice, open, and willing to answer any questions you have about any of their products.

I myself was looking for a natural lubrication because my skin is sensitive and most natural selections are sticky and you don't have many options, they had a good amount of options to pick from in the natural lubrication section and even asked a few questions that would help them find exactly what I was looking for.

I definitely plan on purchasing from x-mart again because of this experience.

name: Angelina Tucker
text: I was very disappointed that’s all I can say. I went into Spencer’s looking for shirts that I desperately needed and I bought five that I absolutely loved. When I got home and tried them on, the inside of the shirts were a disgusting and cheap material that I could not stand. I decided to take them back and when I had bought them I payed $15 that was on a gift card and the rest in cash which was $80+. This was already way more money that I was expecting to pay which I also didn’t really have the money to pay that much but I did. So I took them back and got all of the money on gift cards which I didn’t need since the making of the shirts were poor quality. I asked them why this was and all they could say is it was there policy but didn’t tell me anything about it when I payed. I wanted the corporate number but I had already left so I called them and nobody answered it was just a automatic voice. So now I’m sitting here with $100+ dollars of gift cards that I don’t need when what I need is shirts to wear

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this experience to our attention! You can contact us at guestservices@spencersonline.com or 1-800-762-0419 for further assistance.

The sales lady said she would have the manager call me back that same day. I haven’t heard a word from the manager and I am very disappointed in their customer service. I was originally told that the product I purchased had a year warranty and if I had any issue at all to let the store know. This toy was expensive! Buyer beware!!!

Update: the owner of Sultry reached out to me and was wonderful! My toy will be replaced and I am satisfied! This is a very nice store.

name: Mickie Ann Wagner
text: Store was nice. Staff was snooty and not helpful. We were pretty much ignored until we paid for our selections.

name: Brandice Ware
text: I received phenomenal service and help from Ebony even though my return was lengthy she still with a positive disposition was able to apply my coupons to the best of her abilities. I will be returning to this location.

name: Rebeckah Strickland
text: I used to love shopping here..things have seriously gone down hill. They might have gotten a new look but as for customer service, there is ZERO. I walked in here with my husband and decided to get a couple things. Tried to ask for help to get a price on an unmarked product and I was ignored. Each time I tried to ask someone they basically ran to the back to hide. Lady at the register wasn't helpful either. If this is how you treat your customers then I'll be taking my business elsewhere.

name: Marie Johnson
text: Went the day before Christmas Eve it was busy the lines was very very long.but the move very fast,Cashier 3032894 was very nice and friendly

name: Logan Elise
text: Always helpful staff waiting to greet you, and amazing deals if you buy in bulk. Sexy selections too!

name: Maddie Mills
text: Completely and utterly dissatisfied with my experience at his location this past weekend. Went to take advantage of their sale and happened to get a two piece pajama set as well after I was informed about a promotion they were running. Upon checking out, the cashier told me to just grab a pair of slippers on my way out for the pajama promotion. As I left, I didn't see where to pick these up so I asked a manager and she was suggesting that I was trying to steal because you can't just grab slippers and walk out. Well, if I had not been directed to do so, then I wouldn't have. Turns out, many customers had been told the same thing that day which explains why the alarm kept going off. Ended up walking out after the poor service from the individuals in the store.

name: Carolyn Roland
text: Great sale, everything always in order and staff was friendly and very helpful.

text: It was crowded but other than that I always have a good experience shopping here.

name: Kara Sallee
text: Are there even people who ACTUALLY work here? or that help customers who need assistance?   Left the store empty handed, without so much as a glance from the laughing workers.  Rudest staff I've ever came across. Taking my business elsewhere from now on. ✌🏼
